reviews.review: ı
MIND BLOWN ENDING !

Un juego increíble de principio a fin, desde el minuto uno la historia te lleva y se hace cada vez mejor. Uno de los mejores finales, totalmente inesperado al menos para mí. 

Tip: se debe jugar al BioShock 1 y 2, de lo contrario no se llegan a captar muchas referencias.

Not an amazing game but still a good time. Visuals are still impressive and gameplay is still solid. Story is highly flawed when you really think about it and probably shouldn't have shoehorned that big reference to the OG BioShock. Still I liked Booker and Elizabeth's character development and everything descending into chaos. It definitely isn't the best BioShock or one of the best games period, but it still offers some solid shooting and pretty visuals.
story very nice 8.5/10

Played through the original Bioshock and I thought this one was even better.  There was a good mix of action, story, and discovery to keep the game flow interesting enough to keep coming back to finish.  The story line was a bit edgy and unique and that kind of sets this apart from a lot of other FPS-style single player games.  Would definitely recommend this game.
game is great but the end of story did make my crying..i hope we see Elizabeth back...while end so bad i will here end and dislike :P

Good action FPS.  Story is very good with plenty of twists and turns.  Overall it is an improvement on the previous Bioshock's.  You do not need to play the prequels to enjoy this game.  I highly recommend the Buried at Sea DLC if you like a story driven FPS.
The Lord has blessed me, for I have truly played a masterpiece.
Beste Story die ich jemals gespielt habe
Szczerze polecam 9/10

[h1]十分惋惜，在Irrational Games制作组解散了将近4年后才有幸体验了如此的艺术，如此的伊丽莎白，如此的布克，以及穷尽我无限遐想的Rapture和Columbia。[/h1]

[quote=<Will the Circle Be Unbroken(Full version)>---Ada Ruth Habershon,Charles Hutchinson Gabri]One by one their seats were emptied,
一个接一个的，他们的座位空了

And one by one they went away;
一个接一个的，他们走了

Now the family is parted,
现在家庭已支离破碎

Will it be complete one day?
是否有一天，我们还能重聚？

Will the circle be unbroken
在不久的将来，

By and by, by and by?
命运的轮回能否不被打破？

Is a better home awaiting
是否会有一个更好的家

In the sky, in the sky?
在天空中，在天空。[/quote]

[h1]命运的轮回能否不被打破？常量和变量？[/h1]
美妙绝伦的天空之城哥伦比亚却是一个和《1984》大相径庭的独裁种族主义理想国，阴森潮湿的水底之城销魂城则是自由主义乌托邦，多么绝妙的讽刺。当我初入哥伦比亚时，甚至有一丝“其实这样也挺好的“错觉。然而反差巨大的阶级分化以及习以为常的种族歧视时常把我从梦境拉出。起初也同时认为和一般游戏一样，杀NPC升级质体，打败最终BOSS就结束了，但在Bioshock中，却充斥着失控感，而随着剧情的急转直下，这种失控感转变成对驱动这个世界运行的某种坚硬力量的屈服和无奈。当每次不停摁着N反复指引目标时，却在故事的泥潭里越陷越深，杀死那些挡道的NPC，过量摄取ADAM，获得一个又一个新质体，翻箱倒柜搜刮补给，甚至贫民窟也不放过。
事实上，一代中已经告诉了我这一切的答案。[spoiler]A man chooses.A slave OBEY.[/spoiler]为了对抗哥伦比亚，必须做出一些选择，而这一切只是将自己置于无尽杀戮中自我毁灭，你唯一能选择的，则是[spoiler]在这一切发生之前消灭自己[/spoiler]。bioshock infinite有着许多法国大革命的侧影，前半部分是独裁体制下的暴政和歧视，后半部分则是暴民们腥风血雨的革命滥杀，甚至是攻占巴士底监狱的完整复刻。在这个大前提下，无论是黛西还是康斯托克，都是完成这个轮回的一部分。
不得不说，对于世界观的创造，Bioshock Infinite中还是体现了一定程度的机心，对于康斯托克造神运动及由此产生的政教合一政体、白人至上的法西斯主义、黄祸论、拥奴论，集中谴责了社会的集体盲目性以及对至高无上力量极其人间代言人的天然崇拜以及后期民粹主义的大清洗。不过对于bioshock 1的空想社会主义的乌托邦---Rapture来说还是略显浅薄。

[quote=<You Belong To Me>---Courtnee Draper]Fly the ocean in a silver plane
乘着银色飞机飞跃海洋

See the jungle when it's wet with rain
俯瞰被细雨所浸润的深林

Just remember till you're home again
记得只要你能再次回家呀

You belong to me
你的世界除我外 再无她人[/quote]

[h1]对不起Elizabeth,如果我知道我们无法到达巴黎，那我永远都不会打断你的舞蹈[/h1]
[b]如果说Bioshock Infinite本体剧情让我震撼于其奇妙的世界观的话，DLC海葬二部曲则如一部浪漫悲情电影一样，让我面对Elizabeth的结束戳中泪点，或者换句话说，哭的像条狗。[/b]
没错，对于Elizabeth,集勇敢坚强和善良可爱与一身，令人怜惜而又畏惧，她有着让那些反复跑腿任务变得短暂难忘的魔力，能够与不同的场景互动，服装也会随着场景的不同而改变，并且当我进男女厕搜刮时还不忘吐槽一番，还捏着鼻子跟着进女厕，或者站在男厕外不时对在厕所内搜刮的我对话。[spoiler]突然，这时我觉得我恋爱了XD。可能，这就是鬼父吧。[/spoiler]战斗时会在补给血量亏空时给你弹药、血包，不时会掷给你金币，还不会受伤，让我复活，甚至是过度依赖。直到她被抓住后，突然失去她的我极度不适应，发疯似的跟着剧情寻找她，好像剧情会因为这样缩短一样，对于Elizabeth，我无法再要求更多。
也是Elizabeth这个整个Bioshock中陪你度过一半时光的最重要的角色，[spoiler]算起来,她已经成功杀死了玩家2次，而她自己也选择牺牲---至少两次[/spoiler]，而在《海葬：第二章》里失去能力的她，即使未来不再清晰，但伴随着贯穿整个第二章的La Vie En Rose，一如她玫瑰一般的人生---刺痛但甜美。她也知道自己早已做出了选择，[spoiler]她抛弃了梦中的巴黎而选择葬生海底冷冰冰的金属棺材中[/spoiler]，[h1]于是，她开始在旅途中一点点讲述曾经急忙而未说的故事，那些常量，那些变量，那些故事背后的故事。Elizabeth知道这是她最后的一程，也如Irrational Games知道故事已经到了结尾。Elizabeth在冰凉孤独的深海中与“布克”不断交谈。回忆着自己最心爱的人,你的世界除我外 再无她人[/h1]
至此，最后一个Elizabeth的使命也已经完成。命运的轮回再次归一。
在不久的将来，命运的轮回能否不被打破？

是的，我坚信无论怎样，肯定还有最后一个时空，Elizabeth和Booker永远在彼此身边，在巴黎塞纳河畔永不分离。


[b]最后又去玩了遍Bioshock1我全程用管钳把Frank Fontaine的脑袋瓜开瓢，不要问为什么。。[/b]

Very nice adventure-type shooter that covers interesting topics of religion, propaganda and power.

9/10 Infinite amount of fun

Amazing gameplay and story.
If you like storyrich singleplayer games then you should definitely try this game!

生化奇兵系列可以说是第九艺术的代表作之一了，第一次听说生化奇兵（1代）还是在初中的时候，那时候每晚睡觉前都会打开我的MP4，看下好的XYZ工作室的流程攻略（当时家里电脑配置太差玩不了），一路看下来就好像看了一部科幻反乌托邦电视连续剧（这个工作室对这作的剧情讲解的是真的好，小姐姐的声音也十分好听，可惜生不逢时，现在好像早就解散了），生化奇兵可以说是让我痴迷于单机游戏的启蒙之作，也让我第一次了解到第九艺术的魅力。高中毕业之后我有了自己的电脑，正好无限也已经发售了[spoiler]（下了3DM正版，那时候也不知道steam嘛，(●ˇ∀ˇ●)）	[/spoiler]第一次进入哥伦比亚时真的真的就和大多数人一样，被那天空之城的美以及耳边的圣歌震撼到了。后来与美丽的伊丽莎白相伴，[spoiler]看她在人群中随着音乐翩翩起舞那一段，大概是我在所有玩过的游戏里最难以忘怀的一段记忆了吧[/spoiler]你会真心觉得，她真的存在过一样。看到有位评论说游戏重复度高，没有BOSS的割草游戏的，嗯~感觉其实哪款射击游戏的单机战役都符合你说的那几点。起码在我玩过的射击游戏里面，生化奇兵战斗内容还算挺丰富的。当然一款游戏不可能所有人都喜欢，有人觉得无趣在所难免。所以我推荐那些喜欢剧情的玩家自己一定要自己体验这款游戏，当你通关的那一刻就会发现我绝对没坑你们。买了正版之后把两部DLC补完了，DLC剧情与同一代连起来了，这不得不佩服肯列文的编剧功底，也算是将生化奇兵这个系列画了个不错的句号吧。[spoiler] 心疼一波伊丽莎白，找个时间回一代一定亲手干死你个Atlas[/spoiler]希望今后肯列文能带给我们更精彩的作品。
개잼
上世代的glory，后悔没有原价买,卡列文牛逼坏了！
ЛУЧШАЯ ИГРА В МИРЕ!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Bioshocker that we didn't the game in the trailers.

一年前主线剧情通关，想了想还是写一下测评吧

很早之前玩过1代的爱心分享版，玩了不到30分钟就弃了。后来玩了无限的爱心分享版，玩了不到30分钟又弃了。去年生化奇兵大礼包打折入手，顺理成章的把无限给通关了。（花了钱的就是不一样）

优点
画面：网上的视频里都可以看出来，游戏的画面整体感觉还是偏亮的，不会有特别恐怖的场景，适合像我一样胆小的玩家......玩fps就怕暗不拉几的房间里突然跳出个什么怪东西对不对
操作：游戏的射击手感没得说，指哪儿打哪没有延迟。
剧情：这个游戏的精华部分，属于fps游戏中的佼佼者，就算放眼整个游戏业也是属于第一集团。不过不看网友分析的话可能通关了还不知道什么情况 :D
游戏的还有一大特色就是可以和女主角伊丽莎白一起冒险，她还会在你弹尽粮绝之时给你支援，真正验证了那句话，每个成功男人的背后都有一个默默付出的女人。

缺点
敌人数量太少了，缺乏爽快感

总而言之，这游戏适合喜爱慢节奏的玩家
부커 캐치~~~~!!! 기가 막힌 타이밍
Una clara muestra de que los videojuegos pueden ser obras de arte.
J'ai préféré les DLC "Burial at Sea" au jeu de base ! Ce doit être l'effet Rapture, mais je me suis senti davantage investi dans l'histoire.
One of the best games ever made.
Jeśli jest osoba, która nie grała jeszcze w tą grę, lub poprzednie części, powinna natychmiast poprawić swój błąd. Powiem krótko, świetna gra, świetna fabuła. Szczerze polecam!
Зашел в игру, нашел еду в мусорном ведре,съел. Все как в жизни.

Un cierre de maravillas para esta saga!

Además, Elizabeth es de las mejores coprotagonistas que he visto en un juego.

Bioshock no es sólo un shooter cualquiera, contiene una de las historias más interesantes vistas en un juego, una historia tan completa como compleja, ya que hay que estar atento a todo lo que se menciona, todo hace referencia a algo, puede resultar enredado pero con paciencia se puede entender relativamente todo.

Nos encontraremos con una muy buena jugabilidad, podemos usar distintos tipos de armas, comprar mejoras para cada una, tenemos ropa que podemos encontrar que nos darán ciertas mejoras, tenemos poderes que también podremos comprar mejoras, lo cual nos da una gama de posibilidades para disfrutar del juego a nuestro gusto, y no sólo eso, en los dlc la jugabilidad se expande, como por ejemplo, la jugabilidad con Elizabeth, donde estaremos en un modo mucho más sigiloso, que es algo totalmente distinto a la de nuestro protagonista en Infinite.

La música y las gráficas acompañan de manera perfecta al juego.

Totalmente recomendado, un gran cierre para la saga, una gran historia.
此等神作  不是我的三言两语就能评价的  我永远喜欢伊丽莎白.jpg

伊丽莎白我老婆

Bioshock Infinite is Irrational Games' take on creating a waifu that people of all waifu tastes will enjoy.
Watch as you embark on a journey that in the first act builds the MC's character, and arc, and once you acquire your western waifu, Elizabeth, the game becomes about her and her exposure to the world.

Once the plot of Infinite thickens and you discover exactly why its called Bioshock Infinite, you can notice the reason why the game is called so, within the finite details and interactables of the game. Putting two and two together about so and so isn't that challenging once you have a grasp of the plot.

Once the big plot is revealed the game begins to make all of these cop out reasons using the deus ex machina it itself has created.

However, the game does a good job at constructing a story and putting some emotional investment behind it, whether it be towards your waifu or you are interested in the wibbly wobbly timey wimey stuff.

He seguido la Saga desde el Bioshock 1 y esta ultima entrega ha sido espectacular, una obra maestra, me quito el sombrero con Bioshock Infinite, horas y horas de diversion, no es nada repetitivo y cargado de accion y estrategias por donde quier, un excelente juego, recomendado para los amantes de los fps. Saludos.
One of the best games in a long time with a suprise at the end. No spoiler but... Darn!

Não há palavras para descrever. Pessoalmente adorei. Toda a envolvência, os cenários, os diálogos, a história. Toda esta atmosfera baseada naquilo que alguns chamam do excepcionalismo americano, misturado com a temática da religião, racismo, mostrado a cores. Aconselho vivamento para os fãs de Bioshock, se bem que à partida pouco vão ver dos jogos precedentes. Bioshock Inifnite é uma viagem recomendada a todos, mesmo aos iniciados à saga.

Una aventura increible, escenarios muy hermosos, mecánicas de juego interesantes, dificultad más que decente en su máximo nivel, y una historia que recordarás por siempre. Y con sus DLC's, que pese a la relativa corta duración, cierran perfectamente una historia con un guión que ya quisieran tener producciones de la pantalla grande.

what can i say, ive played this through twice now. 

just fantastic, i got quite attached to the main characters and the(for its time) stunning visuals.
Simplesmente incrível, um dos melhores jogos que já joguei.

Being a complete noob to this game, I didn't really know what to expect. The trailer looked great, and the graphics are really beautiful in their simple way. 
The game has a plethora of cool guns and features to make use of, like the skyhook and the various powers you get to use and aquire along the way. 

If you're new to this game, and it's cheap enough to fit your budget, I reccomend getting it and giving it a shot, I think the story alone will continue to pull you through to the end, even if you don't care for other parts of the game. 

I've only played it through once, and took my sweet time searching everything and so with that one play through I managed to get 12hrs game play out of it, that's not bad for what I paid for it :3 

Save the girl, and wipe away the debt.

Amazing story and gameplay mechanics
Increible juego, con una jugabilidad aceptable y unos graficos atrapantes y una trama extraordinaria
Grandioso juego super envolvente y con una trama de 10!!!
красивая сказка я бы даже сказал
Perfeito.

Der dritte Teil der BioShock-Reihe spielt in Columbia, einer schwebenden Stadt in den Wolken. Damit ist Infinite ein kompletter Stilbruch zu seinen Vorgängerteilen, die beide die Geschichte der Unterwasserstadt Rapture erzählten.

Dennoch lassen sich viele Parallelen zwischen den Spielen erkennen.

Die Grafik ist unglaublich schön und detailliert und die Wolkenstadt Columbia mit ihren schwebenden Stadtteilen, die sich nach einem bestimmten Zeitplan an- und entkuppeln, sowie den Luftschiffen und Beförderungsrailings, ist außergewöhnlich gut gestaltet und sieht einfach nur fantastisch aus.

Auch das Kampfsystem ist annähernd gleich geblieben. Mit unterschiedlichen Schusswaffen und speziellen Kräften muss diesmal gegen das Wachpersonal von Columbia angekämpft werden, da der Spieler gleich am Anfang beschuldigt wird, ein Verbrecher zu sein.
Zahllose Kämpfe und Verfolgungsjagten liegen zwischen dem Spieler und einem Berg von Informationen, die am Ende nur eines verursachen: Ein vollkommenes „Hä?“-Gefühl. Die Story ist unfassbar kompliziert und dreht so viele Kreise, dass das Gehirn lange braucht, um sich daraus einen Reim zu bilden.
Das wiederrum ist aber typisch für die BioShock-Reihe und hat mir deshalb auch wieder unheimlich gut gefallen! Wer nicht selbst mitdenkt und Parallelen zieht, verliert hier ganz schnell den roten Faden (und wahrscheinlich auch die Lust am Spiel).
Wer hier also dranbleiben möchte, darf nicht nur durch das Spiel durchrennen, sondern muss sich unbedingt drauf einlassen!

BioShock: Infinite ist ein toller Abschluss der Serie (auch wenn ich die DLCs Burial at the Sea 1+2 als ganz endgültigen Abschluss sehe) und ein unheimlich tolles Spiel!
Klare Kaufempfehlung meinerseits!

Brilliant story, which gave me plenty of playthroughs where I noticed new details every time. Took about a week to get an understanding on HOW the story worked out and why certain things were the way they were. Atmosphere; fitting music and chatting pedestrians make exploring a blast, with plenty of colours.

Fighting mechanics might not be the best of today but definitely solid, with great abilities  and variabilities.

Would buy this even if it was listen for a higher price, definitely one of my favourite games out there.

İlginç ve eğlenceli bir oyun. Gökyüzünde bir şehir, neredeyse her nesneyle iletişim, değişik silahlar, harika bir atmosfer, özel güçler ve akıcı bir hikaye. Bir oyundan daha ne beklenebilir ki. Oynamaya değer. Parasını hakediyor mu? EVET...
The ending hit me hard in the back.
It only gets better with every replay.
剧情和世界很宏大壮观，但是做成FPS我反正是玩儿得有点晕
Got the base game and season pass on sale and it has to be one of my best purchases I've made. One of my favourite games

不过为了剧情还是值得一玩的。
Hermoso.

I would HIGHLY recommend this game to anyone! This is a masterpiece, and Bioshock fans as well as people who have never played any of the games before will really enjoy it.

Combat is well paced and challenging, but rewarding. Progression is non-linear and totally up to the player! Ultimately though, the story carries this game. If you have not played this game, you definitely should!
incrível

OBRA DE ARTE.

Con la otra obra del arte del primero y Rapture.

Este juego cambia los diseños y en vez de luchar contra Splicer's. Luchamos contra policías y demás.

Es cierto que no es un Biosock original, con eso de ayudar o recolectar a las little sister's.

Pero con la historia y esos 5 minutos finales... lo hacen obra de arte. Viva los Lutece.

----

La única contra es que es repetitivo todo, como toda la saga, disparos, disparos, secuencia, más disparos, tener que abrir la puerta de este sector, abrir la otra, con disparos por supuesto, enfrentarte a jefes, jefes que verás en más nº en un futuro... más disparos, historia, disparos, etc etc etc.

Tanto que no es agradable jugarlo en un sólo día para completar el juego (que es perfectamente durable para jugar 6 horas y ya)

A história do jogo é a melhor da trilogia, complexa, personagens marcantes, reviravoltas e as revelações finais... cara... muito bom!
Os gráficos são muito lindos! Columbia é uma cidade cheia de cor e vida, seus cenários são incríveis.
As músicas são relaxantes e interagem com as cenas do game.
O jogo fornece várias armas e os poderes (vigores) são muito úteis em diversas situações. Jogabilidade monstra.
O melhor Bioshock!
fps 게임을 좋아하진 않지만 이게임만큼은 재밌게한것같다.

This game feels like a worthy successor to the original BioShock of 2007. This game has a compelling atmosphere and characters you feel invested in. Walking around Columbia, particularly in the very beginning, is a real treat. The powers (vigors) in this game are creative and enjoyable to use in combat, and the skyline traversal is a fun way to maneuver during fights. Without getting into spoilers I'd say that the story in this game doesn't quite live up to the original entry, but it's still quite clever and enjoyable, it just is paced a little too slowly with a flood of exposition at the end. Also there are some plot holes if you're nitpicky like that. All in all I throughly enjoyed this game, and with a campaign of just under 15 hours for me it felt like a good value. However it should be noted that this game provides no choices that would prompt repeat playthroughs. If you liked the original BioShock I can't imagine not liking this entry in the franchise.

Excellent game, from the combat to the story. Of course, the fights do become somewhat repetitive after a while, though the plot and somewhat brief length of the game are more than enough to make up for the drawbacks. Not too much of a challenge, even on 1999 mode. Plenty of collectibles for the completionist in all of us. Additionally, the story ties back nicely to the previous entries (primarily the first), so I'd highly suggest you go back and complete Bioshock 1 prior to playing this title.
good stuff.

This game was amazing. The mechanics made me fall in love with using keyboard and mouse and the audio was phenominal with just regular apple headphones. In terms of the story, it was so well made that I always looked forward to continuing it every time I had to end my current session. 

Ending was a big mindf*ck. 10/10
Птичку жалко.
Игра, безусловно заслуживает место в истории игровой индустрии. От сюжета плывут мозги.
Story zwar ein bischen kurz, dafür jedoch sehr sehr gut. Endlich wieder ein Spiel, welches einen so richtig mitnimmt. Tolle Atmosphäre, Grafik auchnoch ansehnlich. Große Empfehlung
Лучшая, и я не встретил не одного бага! Всё оптимизирыванно!

Booker，你是我唯一的朋友

Игру купил на распродаже, в оснвном из-за горы хороших отзывов, в том числе и от знакомых. Сказать что я был разочарован, значит ничего не сказать. Таких скучных перестрелок я не видел со времен "Bad Day L.A.". Уровни за частую масштабные и открытые, и из-за этого иногда категорически непонятно кто и откуда в тебе стреляет, куда черт побери дальше идти, и к чему вообще все это. Игровой мир, один из немногих неоспоримых плюсов игры. Действительно Колумбия продумана и прописана отлично, и наблюдать за небольшими сценами и слушать части диалогов прохожих бывает интересно, но Биошок это не спасает. Сюжет, от которого все тут в восторге тоже не впечатлил, особенно учитывая через какие дебри дубового геймплея приходится прорубаться.
Стронгли нот рекоменд.!!11рас

I played the last 2 Bioshock games and I just finished this one and I really Love it. The ending was just perfect except the last part lol . Still I really Love it. Especially the theory about how the other games is connected to this one and it's characters. Again I really love it.
